name: GTBank pays you interest on your savings account. Collect ₩200
For riding okada without your helmet on, pay a fine of ₩50
For calling 767 and saving a life, receive $50.
Get Out of Kirikiri Jail Free. This card may be kept until needed or sold/traded.
Go to Jail. Go directly to Kirikiri jail. Do not pass 'Go', Do not collect $200.
Park! Park! For Reckless driving, pay a fine of $50 and register at the Lagos State Driver's institute (LASDRI) for retraining.

July 14 is tree planting day! For Planting a tree, collect $50

You are assessed for flooding damage repairs. $40 per house. $115 per hotel
